articles.title: Meteorites from Mars help scientists understand the red planet’s interior
articles.description: These rare rocks come in a few different types, which can tell geologists about Mars’ volcanic past and hint at its potential habitability.

articles.author: Ethan Huff
articles.title: Nearly All Of Houston Suffers BLACKOUT After Beryl Makes Landfall
articles.description: Much of southern Texas is without power after Tropical Storm Beryl, downgraded from a hurricane, made landfall in the Houston area in the early morning hours of July 8.
